    • Classic HighlightsOur Vietnam classic highlights itineraries are designed to make the most out of your journey through Vietnam by featuring the very best of the country. By visiting iconic and must-see destinations, our highlights tours create a broad and all-encompassing picture of Vietnam while offering unique opportunities for in-depth cultural discovery along the way. For travellers looking to experience all that Vietnam has to offer, a classic highlights tour promises an unforgettable journey.
